message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn!  I'll be a little more than fair. This is a good deal for you before inflation eats away at your share even more.
I'll lower my share a bit, but you should consider the inflation too
This is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering you a more than fair deal considering the inflation. Take it before it's too late!
I'm willing to compromise, but don't think you can pressure me
This is my final offer. You're losing more to inflation with every passing round.  Let's be reasonable and end this.
